Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: cyclotron \cyclotron\ n. a particle accelerator that imparts energies of several million electron-volts to rapidly moving particles; it is used in investigations in nuclear physics and particle physics. [WordNet 1.5 +PJC]
cyclotron n : an accelerator that imparts energies of several million electron-volts to rapidly moving particles
